keyMoments.title: Confrontation with Ohm at Upper Ruins
keyMoments.description: Zoro confronts the priest Ohm alongside Gan Fall and Wyper at the Upper Ruins, beginning the deadly Ordeal of Iron.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Zoro's direct confrontation with one of Enel's four priests, testing his strength against a formidable opponent with a 0% survival rate.

keyMoments.title: Discovers Unconscious Chopper
keyMoments.description: Zoro finds Chopper lying unconscious on the ground during the chaos at the Upper Ruins.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Zoro's concern for his crewmate and reveals the aftermath of previous battles with the priests.

keyMoments.title: Fights Holy
keyMoments.description: Zoro engages in combat with Holy, Ohm's giant trained dog companion.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that even animal companions of the priests are serious threats requiring Zoro's full attention.

keyMoments.title: Knocked Out by Ohm
keyMoments.description: Ohm exploits Zoro's distraction over Nola swallowing his allies and knocks him out with an Iron Cloud sword strike.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even Zoro can be defeated when facing overwhelming odds and superior tactical awareness, emphasizing the danger of the Skypiea trials.

keyMoments.title: Arrives at Upper Ruins with Aisa
keyMoments.description: Nami arrives at the Upper Ruins on a Waver with Aisa while being pursued by Enforcers.
keyMoments.significance: Brings Nami directly into the danger zone of Ohm's Ordeal of Iron.

keyMoments.title: Saved from Wyper's Burn Bazooka
keyMoments.description: Gan Fall rescues Nami from Wyper's Burn Bazooka attack.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the chaotic nature of the battle where allies and enemies are mixed together.

keyMoments.title: Swallowed by Nola
keyMoments.description: Nami is swallowed whole by the massive python Nola along with Gan Fall, Aisa, and Pierre.
keyMoments.significance: Places Nami in extreme danger and sets up her eventual reunion with Luffy inside Nola's stomach.

keyMoments.title: Trapped in Mysterious Cave
keyMoments.description: Luffy is shown struggling inside what he perceives as a cave, not realizing he is actually inside Nola's stomach.
keyMoments.significance: Provides comedic relief and builds tension for Luffy's eventual realization and meeting with other swallowed characters.

keyMoments.title: Confronts Warriors at Upper Ruins
keyMoments.description: Ohm declares that Zoro, Gan Fall, and Wyper must defeat him to proceed, initiating the deadly Ordeal of Iron.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Ohm as the primary antagonist of this episode and demonstrates his role as guardian of the Upper Ruins.
keyMoments.quote: Only if I am defeated can you proceed.

keyMoments.title: Philosophy on Human Conflict
keyMoments.description: Ohm expresses his pessimistic worldview about humanity and conflict.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Ohm's character philosophy and his justification for the deadly trials.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Zoro and Wyper
keyMoments.description: Ohm exploits the warriors' distraction to launch a devastating Iron Cloud sword attack that knocks out both Zoro and Wyper.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates why the Ordeal of Iron has a 0% survival rate and showcases Ohm's superior tactical combat abilities.

abilities.description: Ohm can sense presences and predict movements using Observation Haki.
A sword whose blade is Iron Cloud that can be freely manipulated in shape and length.

reveals.information: Humans constantly fight one another despite seeking peace

keyMoments.title: Confronts Ohm at Upper Ruins
keyMoments.description: Wyper battles alongside Zoro and Gan Fall against the priest Ohm.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Wyper's continued efforts to reclaim Upper Yard for the Shandia people.

keyMoments.title: Fires Burn Bazooka
keyMoments.description: Wyper launches his Burn Bazooka weapon in Nami's direction, demonstrating the power of Shandian dial-based weaponry.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Wyper's powerful arsenal and his aggressive warrior nature.

keyMoments.title: Knocked Out by Ohm
keyMoments.description: Wyper is knocked unconscious by Ohm's Iron Cloud sword attack.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that even the strongest Shandian warrior can be defeated by the priests.

abilities.description: A bazooka equipped with a Breath Dial that fires large blasts of flames.

keyMoments.title: Battles Ohm at Upper Ruins
keyMoments.description: Gan Fall joins Zoro and Wyper in confronting the priest Ohm.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the former God fighting to protect people from Enel's tyrannical regime.

keyMoments.title: Saves Nami from Wyper's Attack
keyMoments.description: Gan Fall swoops in with Pierre to rescue Nami and Aisa from Wyper's Burn Bazooka attack.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Gan Fall's protective nature and his role as a guardian figure.

keyMoments.title: Swallowed by Nola
keyMoments.description: Gan Fall is swallowed by Nola along with Nami, Aisa, and Pierre while trying to protect them.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Gan Fall's willingness to sacrifice himself for others, even at great personal risk.

keyMoments.title: Arrives at Upper Ruins with Nami
keyMoments.description: Aisa arrives at the dangerous Upper Ruins with Nami on a Waver.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Aisa's tendency to rush into danger despite her young age and fear of death.

keyMoments.title: Swallowed by Nola
keyMoments.description: Aisa is swallowed by the giant python Nola along with Nami, Gan Fall, and Pierre.
keyMoments.significance: Places the young girl with innate Mantra abilities in extreme danger.

abilities.description: Aisa was born with the ability to use Observation Haki and can sense voices disappearing (deaths).

keyMoments.title: Swallows Multiple Characters
keyMoments.description: Nola suddenly rises up and swallows Nami, Gan Fall, Aisa, and Pierre whole in one gulp.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Nola's massive size and hunting capability. This event reunites swallowed characters with Luffy inside Nola's stomach.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Found Unconscious by Zoro
keyMoments.description: Chopper is discovered lying unconscious on the ground at the Upper Ruins.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the aftermath of Chopper's battle with one of the priests, emphasizing the danger of the Ordeal trials.

keyMoments.title: Observes Events with Mantra
keyMoments.description: Enel uses his Mantra (Observation Haki) to monitor all events occurring at the Upper Ruins.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Enel's godlike surveillance capabilities and builds tension for his eventual direct confrontation.

keyMoments.title: Delivers the Going Merry
keyMoments.description: Pagaya successfully brings the Going Merry to the designated meeting point with Conis.
keyMoments.significance: Ensures the Straw Hats' ship is safe and ready for their eventual escape from Upper Yard.

keyMoments.title: Helps Deliver the Going Merry
keyMoments.description: Conis assists Pagaya in bringing the Going Merry to the meeting point.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the loyalty and helpfulness of the Skypiean allies to the Straw Hats.
